```def is_bot_message(payload: WildValue) -> bool:
    app_api_id = payload.get("api_app_id").tame(check_none_or(check_string))
    bot_app_id = (
        payload.get("event", {})
        .get("bot_profile", {})
        .get("app_id")
        .tame(check_none_or(check_string))
    )
    return bot_app_id is not None and app_api_id == bot_app_id```

elements.text:
def is_bot_message(payload: WildValue) -> bool:
    app_api_id = payload.get("api_app_id").tame(check_none_or(check_string))
    bot_app_id = (
        payload.get("event", {})
        .get("bot_profile", {})
        .get("app_id")
        .tame(check_none_or(check_string))
    )
    return bot_app_id is not None and app_api_id == bot_app_id
